body.name: HENCKELS Solution Razor-Sharp 2-pc Knife Set, Santoku Knife 5 Inch, Santoku Knife 7 Inch, German Engineered Informed by 100+ Years of Mastery, Stainless Steel

features: ULTRA-SHARP BLADES: Superior professional-level sharpness that ensures precision cutting.
THE LAST KNIFE YOU’LL EVER NEED TO BUY: German Engineered Knife Informed by over 100 Years of Mastery. HENCKELS knives are built to last.
EFFORTLESS CUTTING: Enjoy easy meal prep and paper-thin cuts with minimal effort with this lightweight, easy-to-use knife.
SET INCLUDES: 5.5-inch Henckels Santoku Knife and 7-inch Henckels Santoku Knife
QUICK CLEAN UP: No-fuss cleanup, in the dishwasher or by hand. Stain and rust-free blades.
WORTH THE SPLURGE: HENCKELS knives start out razor-sharp and stay sharper longer, even with minimal care.
DURABLE BLADE: Single-piece, precision-stamped blade construction provides durability.
STAYS SHARP LONGER: Professional, satin-finished blade boasts precision cutting and is finely honed for long-lasting sharpness
body.description: Fabricated from high-quality stainless steel, the single-piece, precision-stamped blades boast excellent cutting precision.The professional, satin-polished, fine-edge blades are finely honed for long-lasting precision. The knives' full tang construction and ergonomic handles give you the balance and strength you need to confidently slice through tough cuts with ease. Easy to use, these dishwasher-safe knives are also easy to maintain.Henckels International makes essential kitchen knives that every home chef needs. Each knife offers high quality at an exceptional value. Created in 1895 by Zwilling J.A. Henckels, this value-driven brand guarantees the same durability, design and ease of use for which the global company is known. Equip your kitchen with expertise with Henckels International.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really love these knives. Good price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real nice quality
reviews.reviewText: These things are sharp. Really sharp. Watch your fingers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not real Henkel knives.
reviews.reviewText: If you are thinking you are getting the real German made Henkel knife beware. These are made in India and are nowhere near the quality of the German made version. With that being said for the amount you spend they are not a bad knife. They do not hold the edge that I was expecting but the steel doesn’t appear to be rusting yet either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent, sharp knives

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't go wrong
reviews.reviewText: When I worked in an industrial caffeteria long decades ago, they only bought henckels n one other brand well known brand. They sharpened well n kept their temper. These R the homeowners grade but they retain an edge sweet, tho only used 4-5 times a wk. They're kinda nearthe apex of value ( emphasis on value) chef blades. Would buy again, but can't C why I'd need 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice feel, good price
reviews.reviewText: I see the other two negative ratings so I had to simply jump in and say that this is not my experience. They are lighter feeling, yes, which makes them easier to handle and better balanced. They even cut a block of cheese! I am very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a knife
reviews.reviewText: It is not a knife. It does not cut anything. Even after excessive sharpening, I could not get it to work the way it should as a knife!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I do like these knives because they are very lightweight but also have to be careful not to bend the blades...the handles are very sturdy and are the right size for me.

reviews.reviewTitle: They are ok for the money
reviews.reviewText: They are a bit light weight
Not even close to Henckel quality from years ago. The 5 inch knife was so dull it was not even useable and the 7 inch dulled very quickly. Waste of money.
